message:
Addiction is never truly a choice. It ALWAYS begins due to physical or psychological trauma that makes the victim seek any escape from unbearable pain. People in bad situations find company in misery then get into dangerous party scenes or medicate alone to escape the trauma. Then even if they
[...Content omitted due to length constraints...]
when addiction is full blown to stop killing themselves. How is that not mental illness? And like with any mental illness, addicts are never completely healed. They have to play mental tricks to fight addiction 24/7, seek therapy, sometimes take medication and are always one weak moment away from relapse.
